=Table triplets_list_element=
==Remarks==
A Triplet_List_Element corresponds to a table of three columns (Code, Name, Period).

==Schema==
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Not Null* || *Primary Key* || *Foreign Key* || *Remarks * ||
|| id_flexible_element || bigint || X || X || [flexible_element](id_flexible_element) || This is the primary key of the table and also a foreign key on the table flexible_element which is its parent table. ||
